name: example-test
description: This project is bootstrapped with [Create Elm App](https://github.com/halfzebra/create-elm-app).

scripts.test-init: node --experimental-modules ../src/elm-alchemy.mjs init TestProject && node --experimental-modules ../src/elm-alchemy.mjs new Bar
scripts.test-build: npm run test-clean && npm run test-init
scripts.test: npm run test-clean && npm run test-init && elm-test
